pope.name: Alexander Pope
pope.description: Heroic couplets in ornate 18th-century English. A poetic and grand rendering.

chapman-1611.name: George Chapman (1611)
chapman-1611.description: Early modern English with dense, poetic phrasing. The first complete English translation.

chapman-modern.name: George Chapman (modern)
chapman-modern.description: Modernized spelling and formatting of Chapman's original 1611 translation.

cowper.name: William Cowper
cowper.description: Formal and serious blank verse in the style of Milton. Less poetic flourish than Pope.

murray.name: A.T. Murray
murray.description: Loeb Classical Library translation. Straightforward, scholarly prose with Greek on facing pages.
